name: Toy Soldiers 2: Finest Hour
summary: Saving the free world  from Axis domination isn't all franks and beans in TS2: Finest Hour. Survive Dunkirk, siege the beaches of Normandy, battle the Imperial Navy in the Pacific and beware the dreaded arsenal of secret Nazi weapons!
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 平台: Xbox One
  • 平台: PS4
  • 平台: Nintendo Switch
  • 游戏类型: Action, Strategy
  • 游玩人数: 单人，多人
  • 官方网站: https://www.toysoldiersgame.com/toy-soldiers-2-finest-hour
  • 开发: Signal Studios
